artist: Artist: W. B. Clarke; Engraver: T. Bradley; Publisher: Baldwin and Cradock
description: map of Munich, colored with green and red; view of the city from the east at bottom of sheet
inscription:
Inscription

LLC, printed in black: [W.B. Clarke Arch.]; bottom center, printed in black: [Published by Baldwin & Cradock, 47 Paternoster Row, Dec. 1st, 1832.]; LRC, printed in black: [Engd. by T. Bradley]
provenance: Harry M. Drake, St. Paul; Estate of Harry M. Drake; bequeathed to MIA, 2013
title: Map of Munich
